sqlMap.select: select user_name as "userName", seller_estimate_no as "sellerEstimateNo", seller_estimate_amount as "sellerEstimateAmount", user_estimate_moving_date as "userEstimateMovingDate" from (select row_number() over (order by seller_deposit_no desc) num, U.user_name, SE.seller_estimate_no, SE.seller_estimate_amount, UE.user_estimate_moving_date from seller_deposit X, seller_estimate SE, user_estimate UE, users U where X.seller_no = #sellerNo# and SE.status_no = 100002 and X.seller_estimate_no = SE.seller_estimate_no and SE.user_estimate_no = UE.user_estimate_no and UE.user_no = U.user_no and UE.user_estimate_moving_date between to_date(#startDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) where num between #begin# and #end#

select count(*) from seller_deposit D, seller_estimate SE, user_estimate UE, users U where D.seller_no = #sellerNo# and SE.status_no = 100002 and D.seller_estimate_no = SE.seller_estimate_no and SE.user_estimate_no = UE.user_estimate_no and UE.user_no = U.user_no and UE.user_estimate_moving_date between to_date(#startDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
